description: One thing is to try an app from a reputable developer. Another is to avoid an app from a possible "suspicious" developer. Research it.
Author is with Red Hat, but code dates from 2012. Not functional in GUI, command line usage not evaluated.
summary: Researched it. Not Dubious, Just Out of Date

description: SELinux project is opensource. however, this is stating closedsource license? Yet the details of this are copied pasted RedHat details of SELinux.
